metadata.title: CVE-2023-52769 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: wifi:ath12k: fix htt mlo-offset event locking The ath12k active pdevs areprotected by RCU but the htt mlo-offset event handling code callingath12k_mac_get_ar_by_pdev_id() was not marked as a read-side criticalsection. Mark the code in question as an RCU read-side critical section toavoid any potential use-after-free issues. Compile tested only.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-52769` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.5.0-25-generic - 6.5.0-25.25
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-25-generic - 6.5.0-25.25
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-25-generic-64k - 6.5.0-25.25
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1015-aws - 6.5.0-1015.15
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1016-azure - 6.5.0-1016.16
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1015-gcp - 6.5.0-1015.15
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1011-laptop - 6.5.0-1011.14
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-25-lowlatency - 6.5.0-25.25.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-25-lowlatency-64k - 6.5.0-25.25.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1018-oracle - 6.5.0-1018.18
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1018-oracle-64k - 6.5.0-1018.18
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1012-raspi - 6.5.0-1012.15
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1009-starfive - 6.5.0-1009.10
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-25.25').
linux-aws package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1015.15').
linux-azure package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1016.16').
linux-gcp package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1015.15').
linux-ibm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of kernel support').
linux-laptop package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1011.14').
linux-lowlatency package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-25.25.1').
linux-oracle package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1018.18').
linux-raspi package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1012.15').
linux-starfive package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1009.10').
